root.name: Nursery Rhyme
root.description: System Requirements Operating System: Windows 98 / Me / 2000 / XP (Vista is not supported) CPU：Pentium II at 450MHz (800 MHz recommended) RAM：128MB. 256MB for XP. Video Card：800×600, high color VRAM：4MB VRAM Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible DirectX：Version 8.1 DVD-ROM： 4x Speed PatchesYou can download a patch from the Official Site's support page.
